verses.verse: And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the steward of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H4390>Fill<s%> the <S%H582>men's<s%> <S%H572>sacks<s%> with <S%H400>food<s%>, as much <S%H834>as<s%> they <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H5375>carry<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in his <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>. the steward: Heb. him that was over his house

And <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H1375>cup<s%>, the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H1375>cup<s%>, in the <S%H572>sack's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H6996>youngest<s%>, and his <S%H7668>corn<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%>. And he <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.
As soon as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> was <S%H215>light<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> were sent <S%H7971>away<s%>, they and their <S%H2543>asses<s%>.

And when they were gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and not yet far <S%H7368>off<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1004>steward<s%>, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%>; and when thou dost <S%H5381>overtake<s%> them, <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Wherefore have ye <S%H7999>rewarded<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>?

Is not this it in which my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H8354>drinketh<s%>, and whereby <S%H5172>indeed<s%> he <S%H5172>divineth<s%>? ye have done <S%H7489>evil<s%> in so <S%H6213>doing<s%>. divineth: or, maketh trial?
And he <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them, and he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them these <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Wherefore <S%H1696>saith<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%>? God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> should <S%H6213>do<s%> according to this <S%H1697>thing<s%>:

Behold, the <S%H3701>money<s%>, which we <S%H4672>found<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks'<s%> <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, we brought <S%H7725>again<s%> unto thee out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>: how then should we <S%H1589>steal<s%> out of thy <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> or <S%H2091>gold<s%>?
With whomsoever of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> it be <S%H4672>found<s%>, both let him <S%H4191>die<s%>, and we also will be my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Now also let it be according unto your <S%H1697>words<s%><S%H3651>:<s%> he with whom it is <S%H4672>found<s%> shall be my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and ye shall be <S%H5355>blameless<s%>.
Then they <S%H4116>speedily<s%> took <S%H3381>down<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H572>sack<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, and <S%H6605>opened<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H572>sack<s%>.

And he <S%H2664>searched<s%>, and <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H1419>eldest<s%>, and <S%H3615>left<s%> at the <S%H6996>youngest<s%>: and the <S%H1375>cup<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H572>sack<s%>.
Then they <S%H7167>rent<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes<s%>, and <S%H6006>laded<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; for he was yet there: and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What <S%H4639>deed<s%> is this that ye have <S%H6213>done<s%>? wot <S%H3045>ye<s%> not that such a <S%H376>man<s%> as I can <S%H5172>certainly<s%> <S%H5172>divine<s%>? divine: or, make trial?

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What shall we <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%>? what shall we <S%H1696>speak<s%>? or how shall we clear <S%H6663>ourselves<s%>? <S%H430>God<s%> hath found <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>: behold, we are my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%>, both we, and he <S%H1571>also<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, God <S%H2486>forbid<s%> that I should <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>so<s%>: but the <S%H376>man<s%> in whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H1375>cup<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%>, he shall be my <S%H5650>servant<s%>; and as for you, get you <S%H5927>up<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%> unto your <S%H1>father<s%>.

Then <S%H3063>Judah<s%> came <S%H5066>near<s%> unto him, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>Oh<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%>, let thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, I pray thee, <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> in my <S%H113>lord's<s%> <S%H241>ears<s%>, and let not thine <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burn<s%> against thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>: for thou art even as <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.
My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3426>Have<s%> ye a <S%H1>father<s%>, or a <S%H251>brother<s%>?

And we <S%H559>said<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%>, We <S%H3426>have<s%> a <S%H1>father<s%>, an old <S%H2205>man<s%>, and a <S%H3206>child<s%> of his old <S%H2208>age<s%>, a little <S%H6996>one<s%>; and his <S%H251>brother<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and he alone is <S%H3498>left<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> him.
And thou <S%H559>saidst<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, Bring him <S%H3381>down<s%> unto me, that I may <S%H7760>set<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon him.

And we <S%H559>said<s%> unto my <S%H113>lord<s%>, The <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>: for if he should <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, his father would <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And thou <S%H559>saidst<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H3808>Except<s%> your <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> with you, ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3254><s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> no <S%H7200>more<s%> <S%H3254><s%>.
And it came to pass when we came <S%H5927>up<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, we <S%H5046>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>words<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%>.
And our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Go <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>.

And we <S%H559>said<s%>, We <S%H3201>cannot<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%>: if our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3426>be<s%> with us, then will we go <S%H3381>down<s%>: for we <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%>, <S%H369>except<s%> our <S%H6996>youngest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> be with us.
And thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto us, Ye <S%H3045>know<s%> that my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> me <S%H8147>two<s%> sons:
And the <S%H259>one<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from me, and I <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2963>Surely<s%> he is torn in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>; and I saw <S%H7200>him<s%> not <S%H2008>since<s%>:

And if ye <S%H3947>take<s%> this also <S%H5973>from<s%> <S%H6440>me<s%>, and <S%H611>mischief<s%> befall <S%H7136>him<s%>, ye shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> my gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> with <S%H7451>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%>.

Now therefore when I <S%H935>come<s%> to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> be not with us; seeing that his <S%H5315>life<s%> is bound <S%H7194>up<s%> in the lad's <S%H5315>life<s%>;

It shall come to pass, when he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> that the <S%H5288>lad<s%> is not with us, that he will <S%H4191>die<s%>: and thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall bring <S%H3381>down<s%> the gray <S%H7872>hairs<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%>.

For thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> became <S%H6148>surety<s%> for the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If I <S%H935>bring<s%> him not unto thee, then I shall bear the <S%H2398>blame<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

Now therefore, I pray thee, let thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> instead of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> a <S%H5650>bondman<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%>; and let the <S%H5288>lad<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> with his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

For <S%H349>how<s%> shall I go <S%H5927>up<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>, and the <S%H5288>lad<s%> be not with me? lest peradventure I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that shall come <S%H4672>on<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%>. come: Heb. find my father
